name: @clevertree/hook-transpiler
description: Minimal JSX/TSX transpiler for Relay hooks on web and Android (JavaScriptCore/JNI)

scripts.build:wasm: wasm-pack build --release --target web --features wasm && mkdir -p wasm && cp pkg/relay_hook_transpiler* wasm/ && mkdir -p dist/web/wasm && cp pkg/relay_hook_transpiler* dist/web/wasm/ && mkdir -p dist/wasm && cp pkg/relay_hook_transpiler* dist/wasm/ && cp ../md2jsx/pkg/md2jsx* wasm/ && cp ../md2jsx/pkg/md2jsx* dist/web/wasm/ && cp ../md2jsx/pkg/md2jsx* dist/wasm/
scripts.build:wasm:debug: wasm-pack build --release --target web --features wasm,debug && mkdir -p wasm && cp pkg/relay_hook_transpiler* wasm/ && mkdir -p dist/web/wasm && cp pkg/relay_hook_transpiler* dist/web/wasm/ && mkdir -p dist/wasm && cp pkg/relay_hook_transpiler* dist/wasm/
scripts.test: cargo test && npm run build && node --test dist/web/selfCheck.test.js
scripts.test:debug: cargo test --features debug && npm run build:debug && node --test dist/web/selfCheck.test.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
